sense.gloss: last train (bus, flight, etc.; of the day)
to end, to come to an end, to close, to finish
doing something from beginning to end, being unchanged from beginning to end
from beginning to end, the whole time, throughout, consistently
end of war, cessation of hostilities
all day, for a whole day
end of a game of go, shogi, etc.
continuously, from beginning to end, from first to last
full particulars, the whole story, from beginning to end
end of the work day, close of business
end of the school term, end of the school year
all one's life, throughout one's life, as long as one lives
in the end, after all, never (happened)
final chapter, last chapter, last section (of a book, essay, song etc.), epilogue

x: お仕舞い・おしまい・1

sense.gloss: ending before one had time to do something one wanted or intended to
arriving at the final stop (of a bus, train, etc.), reaching the end of the line
(bringing to a) perfect end, (rounding off with a) crowning achievement, successful conclusion, triumphant finish
the end, closing, being done for
that's it, that's enough, that's all

last time, last inning, last part, final episode (of a television program)

sense.gloss: to finish, to stop, to end, to put an end to, to bring to a close
to close (a business, etc.), to close down, to shut down, to shut up

to do accidentally, to do without meaning to, to happen to do

sdata.j: ↑休↑↓やす↓みは↑終↑↓お↓わった。
sdata.e: The vacation is over now.

sdata.j: これで↑休暇↑↓きゅうか↓は↑終↑↓お↓わった。
sdata.e: The vacation is over now.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちはもう↑終↑↓お↓わったわ。↑指輪↑↓ゆびわ↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓して！
sdata.e: It's over between us. Give me back my ring!

sdata.j: ↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑犯↑↓はん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑終身↑↓しゅうしん↓↑刑↑↓けい↓に↑処↑↓しょ↓せられた。
sdata.e: The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.

sdata.j: ほぼ↑終↑↓お↓わった。
sdata.e: I'm almost done.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑正午↑↓しょうご↓までにこの↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑終↑↓お↓わらせねばならない。
sdata.e: You have to get this work finished by noon.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑前↑↓まえ↓にそれを↑終↑↓お↓わらせておくべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have completed it long ago.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓を↑終↑↓お↓えたのか。
sdata.e: Have you finished doing your homework yet?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓をし↑終↑↓お↓えたのですか。
sdata.e: Have you finished doing your homework yet?

sdata.j: ↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓はもう↑終↑↓お↓わったのですか。
sdata.e: Have you done all your homework?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもうその↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑読↑↓よ↓み↑終↑↓お↓えましたか。
sdata.e: Have you finished reading that book yet?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はちょうど↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓を↑終↑↓お↓えたところだ。
sdata.e: You have just done your homework.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれを↑終↑↓お↓えましたか。
sdata.e: Have you finished it?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれをいつ↑終↑↓お↓えたのか。
sdata.e: When did you finish it?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつそれを↑終↑↓お↓えたか。
sdata.e: When did you finish it?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑本↑↓ほん↓をそんなに↑早↑↓はや↓く↑読↑↓よ↓み↑終↑↓お↓わってしまうことはできない。
sdata.e: You will not be able to go through the book so quickly.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑小説↑↓しょうせつ↓を↑読↑↓よ↓み↑終↑↓お↓えましたか。
sdata.e: Have you finished reading the novel?

sdata.j: その↑小説↑↓しょうせつ↓は↑読↑↓よ↓み↑終↑↓お↓えましたか。
sdata.e: Have you finished reading the novel?

sdata.j: あなたはその↑小説↑↓しょうせつ↓を↑読↑↓よ↓み↑終↑↓お↓えましたか。
sdata.e: Have you finished reading the novel?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はこの↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓を↑明後日↑↓みょうごにち↓までに↑終↑↓お↓わらせてしまわなければならない。
sdata.e: You must get this homework finished by the day after tomorrow.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑青春↑↓せいしゅん↓が↑終↑↓お↓わったと↑思↑↓おも↓うのももっともだ。
sdata.e: You may have good reason to think that your youth is over.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓はいつ↑終↑↓お↓わりますか。
sdata.e: When will your assignment be completed?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑最終↑↓さいしゅう↓↑成績↑↓せいせき↓について↑言↑↓い↓えば、↑最終↑↓さいしゅう↓↑試験↑↓しけん↓↑次第↑↓しだい↓である。
sdata.e: When talking about your last results, it is dependent on the last examination.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑協力↑↓きょうりょく↓がなかったら、↑私↑↓わたし↓はその↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑時間↑↓じかん↓までに↑終↑↓お↓えることはできなかっただろう。
sdata.e: Had it not been for your cooperation, I could not have finished the work in time.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のもち↑時間↑↓じかん↓はもう↑終↑↓お↓わりです。
sdata.e: Your time is up.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑終↑↓お↓えてしまうまで↑待↑↓ま↓ちます。
sdata.e: I will wait until you have finished your homework.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑帰↑↓かえ↓ってくるまでに↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑終↑↓お↓わっているでしょう。
sdata.e: I will have finished the work before you return.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓があの↑時↑↓とき↓↑一部始終↑↓いちぶしじゅう↓を↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑話↑↓はな↓してくれていたらよかったのに。
sdata.e: If only you had told me the whole story at that time!

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓かね↓の↑貸↑↓か↓し↑借↑↓か↓り↑友誼↑↓ゆうぎ↓の↑終↑↓お↓わり。
sdata.e: Lend your money and lose your friend.

sdata.j: ↑曲↑↓ま↓がりなりにも↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑原稿↑↓げんこう↓を↑書↑↓か↓き↑終↑↓お↓えた。
